title: Oraa Guzura Dado
synopsis: A comedy about a kind but slow-witted dragon who appears from a nearby volcanic eruption. People find Guzura quite charming and interesting as he can consume metal and change it into useful devices.
staff: [['Sasagawa, Hiroshi', ['Director', ' Episode Director', ' Original Creator']], ['Kinoshita, Renzo', ['Episode Director']], ['Toriumi, Jinzou', ['Script', ' Planning']], ['Columbia Yurikago Kai', ['Theme Song Performance']]]
